DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : HIV infection . CD4 count > = 2000 cells/mm3 AND > = 30 percent total lymphocyte . No sign symptom HIV infection ( lymphadenopathy , mild hepatomegaly , hypergammaglobulinemia , splenomegaly , permit ) . Consent parent guardian . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Serious acute infection require parenteral therapy time entry . One serious , proven bacterial infection include follow : septicemia ; pneumonia ; meningitis ; bone joint infection ; abscess internal organ body cavity ( exclude otitis medium superficial skin mucosal abscess ) cause Haemophilus , Streptococcus ( include pneumococcus ) , pyogenic bacteria .
